aasiyawe digama dala atha washayen piliganena â€œmillangoda rajaâ€ athata poshaniya aahara labadimata wanajiwi departhamenthuwa piyawara gani.â€œmillangoda rajaâ€ athage saukhya thaththwaya pirihima pilibandawa wanajiwi departhamenthuwa magin pariksha kara janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata wartha kirimen anathuruwa janadhipathithuman wisin mema hasthiyata dainikawa poshaniya aahara labadena lesa ema departhamenthuwata niyoga kara thibe.wanajiwi ha gowijana sewa amathi es. em. chandrasena mahatha pereda (09) perawaruwe molagoda millangoda ath galata pamina mema athage saukhya thaththwaya pilibandawa thorathuru wimasa baliya.danata masa kipayaka sita mukhaye dath haliyama hethuwen aahara ganime apahasuthawayen pasuwu mema hasthiya durwala thaththwayen pasuwana bawa sabaragamuwa palath sabha manthri aananda millangoda mahatha janadhipathiwarayata danumdimen pasu wanajiwi departhamenthuwe pashu waidya thulmini diyagoda mahathmiya athulu waidya kandayamak pamina athage saukhya thaththwaya pilibandawa pariksha kara bala janadhipathithuman wetha warthawak idiripath kara atha.in anathuruwa mema hasthiyata awashya wishesha poshaniya aahara sapayana lesa janadhipathithuma wanajiwi departhamenthuwata niyoga kara atha.danata wasara haththa dekak pamana wayasathi mema atha 1945 warshaye di aanamaduwa nawagaththegama pradeshayen allagath bawa athage himikaru wana es. aar. ee. millangoda mahatha pawasiya.wasara wisipahakata adhika kalayak mahanuwara shri dalada maligawe dalada karanduwa wadama kirime bhagyaya lath â€œmillangoda rajaâ€ hasthiya wenath dewala ha wihara perahara mangalyayanhidi da sadhathuka karanduwa wadama karawime bhagyaya udakara gaththeki.wanajiwi ha gowijana sewa amathi es. em. chandrasena mahatha:- â€ali athun apage sampathak.
